Overview

The Image Summarization Application is designed to extract, interpret, and summarize content from visual data such as tables, graphs, and abstract images. It is ideal for users who need to analyze and understand large volumes of visual data efficiently. By uploading images, the application provides structured outputs like JSON for tables, captions for abstract visuals, and concise summaries for graphs and plots.


Key Capabilities

Table Conversion

  • Automatically transforms tables within images into JSON format for easy data manipulation and analysis.

Text Extraction

  • Extracts plain text from images, enabling users to access textual information embedded in visual content.

Graph and Plot Summarization

  • Provides concise summaries for graphs and plots, facilitating quick understanding and interpretation of visual data.

Captioning for Abstract Images

  • Enhances comprehension of abstract visuals with automated captions, providing context and clarity to visual content.

Intuitive Upload Functionality

  • Offers a user-friendly interface for swift image uploading and summarization.

How to Use the Application

Upload Images

  • Add one or multiple images containing visual data using the drag-and-drop functionality or the file browser.

Input Prompts

  • Provide specific prompts or questions to tailor the insights provided by the application.

Run Summarization

  • Click on the "Summarize" button to initiate the summarization process.

View Results

  • Analyze the outputs in structured formats such as JSON, captions, or summaries.

Example Use Cases

Invoice Analysis

  • Process invoices (e.g., "Plumbing & Heating Invoice") to extract detailed service information and summarize billing data.

Scientific Research

  • Summarize scientific graphs such as "Penguin Attributes" to understand key measurements (e.g., bill depth, flipper length).

Accessibility Insights

  • Extract structured data from example tables illustrating various disability categories.
